00042 #ifndef __MMDB_SymOp__
00043 #define __MMDB_SymOp__
00044 
00045 #include "mmdb_io_stream.h"
00046 #include "mmdb_defs.h"
00047 
00048 namespace mmdb  {
00049 
00050   //  ====================  SymOp  ========================
00051 
00052   DefineClass(SymOp);
00053   DefineStreamFunctions(SymOp);
00054 
00055   class SymOp : public io::Stream  {
00056 
00057     public :
00058 
00059       SymOp ();
00060       SymOp ( io::RPStream Object );
00061       ~SymOp();
00062 
00063       int  SetSymOp  ( cpstr XYZOperation );
00064       pstr GetSymOp  ();
00065 
00066       void Transform ( realtype & x, realtype & y, realtype & z );
00067 
00068       void GetTMatrix ( mat44 & TMatrix );  // copies T to TMatrix
00069       void SetTMatrix ( mat44 & TMatrix );  // copies TMatrix to T
00070 
00071       bool CompileOpTitle ( pstr S );  // makes XYZOp from matrix T
00072       bool CompileOpTitle ( pstr S, mat44 symMat, bool compare );
00073       void Print          ();          // prints operation and matrix
00074 
00075       void Copy  ( PSymOp symOp );
00076 
00077       void write ( io::RFile f );
00078       void read  ( io::RFile f );
00079 
00080     protected :
00081       pstr  XYZOp;
00082       mat44 T;
00083 
00084       void InitSymOp    ();
00085       void FreeMemory   ();
00086       int  GetOperation ( int n );
00087 
00088   };
00089 
00090 
00091   //  ====================  SymOps  ========================
00092 
00093   enum SYMOP_RC  {
00094     SYMOP_Ok                =  0,
00095     SYMOP_NoLibFile         = -1,
00096     SYMOP_UnknownSpaceGroup = -2,
00097     SYMOP_NoSymOps          = -3,
00098     SYMOP_WrongSyntax       = -4,
00099     SYMOP_NotAnOperation    = -5,
00100     SYMOP_ZeroDenominator   = -6
00101   };
00102 
00103   DefineClass(SymOps);
00104   DefineStreamFunctions(SymOps);
00105 
00106   class SymOps : public io::Stream  {
00107 
00108     public :
00109 
00110       SymOps ();
00111       SymOps ( io::RPStream Object );
00112       ~SymOps();
00113 
00114       virtual void FreeMemory();
00115 
00116       int  SetGroupSymopLib ( cpstr SpaceGroup,
00117                               cpstr symop_lib=NULL );
00118         // Space Group is taken from symop.lib. Return Code:
00119         // SYMOP_Ok <=> success
00120 
00121       int  SetGroup ( cpstr SpaceGroup,
00122                       cpstr syminfo_lib=NULL );
00123         // Space Group is taken from syminfo.lib. Return Code:
00124         // SYMOP_Ok <=> success
00125 
00126       void Reset           ();        // removes all symmetry operations
00127       virtual int AddSymOp ( cpstr XYZOperation ); // adds symmetry
00128                                                    // operation
00129       void PutGroupName    ( cpstr SpGroupName  );
00130 
00131       //  GetNofSymOps()  returns Nops -- the number of sym. operations
00132       int  GetNofSymOps ();
00133       pstr GetSymOp     ( int Nop );
00134 
00135       //  Transform(..) transforms the coordinates according to the
00136       // symmetry operation Nop. The return code is non-zero if
00137       // Nop is a wrong operation number (must range from 0 to Nops-1).
00138       int  Transform ( realtype & x, realtype & y, realtype & z,
00139                        int Nop );
00140 
00141       //  GetTMatrix(..) returns the coordinate transformation matrix
00142       // for the symmetry operation Nop. The return code is non-zero if
00143       // Nop is a wrong operation number (must range from 0 to Nops-1).
00144       int  GetTMatrix ( mat44 & TMatrix, int Nop );
00145 
00146       void Print ();
00147 
00148       virtual void Copy ( PSymOps symOps );
00149 
00150       void write ( io::RFile f );
00151       void read  ( io::RFile f );
00152 
00153     protected :
00154 
00155       pstr    SpGroup;
00156       int     Nops;
00157       PPSymOp symOp;
00158 
00159       void InitSymOps();
00160 
00161   };
00162 
00163 }  // namespace mmdb
